Apparently America rises earlier than many sponsors would believe. Consid¬
erable segments of our population* at least four important occupational groups
besides farmers and other outdoor workers* are apparently interested in radio
programs at or before 6.00 AM. How many people are awake but don't turn the
radio on because they will find only hill-billy or farm programs? Although
a certain number of persons questioned state that they do not normally turn
their radios on until 12:00 o'clock or later* morning hours would seem to be
fairly useful ones for the conveying of important rrtessages* commercial or
otherwise.
